review: I bought my Fire TV Stick for the sole purpose of being able to have the HBO Now app on my TV since this was not an app option on my Smart TV. I was immediately impressed with how easy set up was for not only the Fire Stick but for all the apps I use on a regular basis (Amazon Prime, Netflix, Hulu, Showtime, etc.). I have been using Fire Stick nightly for about two weeks and have had no difficulties. This Fire Stick has been easier to use then the apps were on our Smart TV (quicker loading, easier interface) so now I solely use this for all my non-cable tv and movie entertainment. Highly recommend...especially for the price!
author: Sara Lawless
